description: Standard table definitions for dex protocols.

tables.label: Pools
tables.description: List of LP pools in this protocol (one entry per token in a pool).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

creation_block_number.description: The block this pool was created in.

creation_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block that this pool was created in.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the LP pool.

lp_token_address.description: The token address of the LP token for this pool.

lp_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the LP token.

token_address.description: The token address of the pool token at token_index.

token_index.description: The index in the pool smart contract that this token appears at (ie, one entry per token in a pool).

fee_rate.description: The fee rate of the pool, as a percentage.

dex_type.description: The type of the DEX (e.g., CPMM, CLMM, Orderbook).

tables.label: LP Position Snapshot
tables.description: Snapshot of LP positions in the pools.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

lp_address.description: The address of the liquidity provider.

token_index.description: The token index based on the smart contract.

lp_token_address.description: The contract address of the LP token.

lp_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the LP token.

lp_token_amount.description: The amount of the LP token held by the liquidity provider.

lp_token_amount_usd.description: The amount of the LP token in USD.

fees_usd.description: LP fees paid in the given period, in USD.

incentive_amount.description: The amount of incentives given out over the snapshot period, in USD.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the LP pool.

token_index.description: The token index in the smart contract.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token in the pool.

token_amount.description: The amount of the token in this pool at the snapshot.

token_amount_usd.description: The amount of the token in USD.

pool_volume_usd.description: The volume of the pool in USD, during the snapshot period.

pool_fees_usd.description: The fees of the pool in USD, during the snapshot.

pool_incentive_amount.description: The amount of incentives in the pool, during the snapshot.

pool_incentive_usd.description: The value of incentives in the pool in USD.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

tvl_usd.description: The total value locked in USD.

tables.label: Trades
tables.description: List of trades in the pools.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The log index of the event recorded.

pair_name.description: The name of the token pair.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the LP pool being traded in.

input_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the input token.

input_token_address.description: The contract address of the input token.

input_token_amount.description: The amount of the input token, decimal normalized.

output_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the output token.

output_token_address.description: The contract address of the output token.

output_token_amount.description: The amount of the output token, decimal normalized.

swap_amount_usd.description: The amount of the swap in USD.

fee_usd.description: The fee for the trade in USD.

tables.label: Mints
tables.description: List of mint events in the pools.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the mint.

user_address.description: The address of the user who initiated this event.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

mint_amount.description: The amount of LP token minted by the trader, decimal normalized.

mint_amount_usd.description: The amount of the mint in USD.

tables.label: Burns
tables.description: List of burn events in the pools.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the burn.

user_address.description: The address of the user who initiated this event.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

burn_amount.description: The amount of LP tokens burned, decimal normalized.

burn_amount_usd.description: The amount of the burn in USD.

tables.label: Syncs
tables.description: List of sync events in the pools.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the sync.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

tables.label: Transfers
tables.description: List of transfer events in the pools.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the transfer.

user_address.description: The address of the user who initiated this event.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

pool_token_balance.description: The balance of the pool token, decimal normalized.

tables.label: V3 Events
tables.description: List of V3 events in the pools.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the activity.

transaction_from_address.description: The address from which the transaction originated.

transaction_to_address.description: The address to which the transaction is directed.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token.

tick_lower.description: The lower tick of the liquidity range.

tick_upper.description: The upper tick of the liquidity range.

tables.label: V3 Swaps
tables.description: List of V3 swaps in the pools.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the swap.

user_address.description: The address of the user who made the swap.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

liquidity_amount.description: The liquidity field emitted in a V3 event, decimal normalized.

token0_amount.description: The amount of token0 involved in the swap.

token1_amount.description: The amount of token1 involved in the swap.

sqrt_price_x96.description: The square root of the price multiplied by 2^96.

tables.label: Market Depth User Snapshot
tables.description: Snapshot of market depth from the user's perspective.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the record.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

market_depth_score.description: (Ask for supporting documents and formula). The percentage price range market depth derived from a 30-day realized volatility.
